languages.text: {n}Сестра Арджента кажется уставшей — под глазами залегли темные круги, волосы в легком беспорядке, в движениях — легкая нервозность.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Сестра Арджента кажется уставшей — под глазами залегли темные круги, волосы в легком беспорядке, в движениях — легкая нервозность. Она встречает вас пристальным, чуть недоверчивым взглядом:{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}? У вас дело ко мне? Я надеялась побыть в одиночестве и помолиться..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sister Argenta looks tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat dishevelled, and she moves like she's a little on edge.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Сестра Арджента кажется уставшей — под глазами залегли темные круги, волосы в легком беспорядке, в движениях — легкая нервозность.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sister Argenta is looking tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat disheveled, and she moves like she's a little on edge. She greets you with a stern, slightly mistrustful look.{/n} "Rogue Trader? You have business with me? I was hoping I could pray in private..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Sister Argenta is looking tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat disheveled, and she moves like she's a little on edge. She greets you with a stern, slightly mistrustful look.{/n} "Rogue Trader? You have business with me? I was hoping I could pray in private..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Sister Argenta looks tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat disheveled, and she moves like she's a little on edge. She greets you with a stern, slightly mistrustful look.{/n} "Rogue Trader? You have business with me? I was hoping to have some time alone to pray..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Sister Argenta looks tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat disheveled, and she moves like she's a little on edge. She greets you with a stern, slightly mistrustful look.{/n} "Rogue Trader? You have business with me? I was hoping to have some time alone to pray..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sister Argenta looks tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat dishevelled, and she moves like she's a little on edge. She greets you with a stern, slightly mistrustful look.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? You have business with me? I was hoping to have some time alone to pray..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Sister Argenta looks tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat dishevelled, and she moves like she's a little on edge.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔修女看起来很疲惫。她的眼睛下面带着黑眼圈，头发有些凌乱，动作看起来也有些紧绷{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}？”
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta looks tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat dishevelled, and she moves like she's a little on edge.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔修女看起来很疲惫。她的眼睛下面带着黑眼圈，头发有些凌乱，动作看起来也有些紧绷。她以略带怀疑的严肃眼神看着你。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}？找我有什么事情吗？我本打算一个人祈祷一会儿……”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta looks tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat dishevelled, and she moves like she's a little on edge.{/n} "Rogue Trader?"

languages.text: {n}La hermana Argenta parece agotada. Tiene ojeras, el pelo desaliñado y la tensión de sus movimientos es evidente.{/n} «¿{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta looks tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat dishevelled, and she moves like she's a little on edge.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La hermana Argenta parece agotada. Tiene ojeras, el pelo desaliñado y la tensión de sus movimientos es evidente. Te saluda con una mirada severa y un tanto desconfiada.{/n} «{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, ¿necesita algo de mí? Esperaba tener tiempo para rezar a solas...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}シスター・アルジェンタは疲れて見えた…目の下にはクマがあり、髪は乱れていた。そしてその動きは、どこか苛立っているようにも見えた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}？」
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta looks tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat dishevelled, and she moves like she's a little on edge.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}シスター・アルジェンタは疲れて見えた…目の下にはクマがあり、髪は乱れていた。そしてその動きは、どこか苛立っているようにも見えた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Schwester Argenta wirkt müde – sie hat dunkle Ringe unter den Augen, ihre Haare sind etwas zerzaust, und sie bewegt sich, als wäre sie leicht angespannt und nervös.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta looks tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat dishevelled, and she moves like she's a little on edge.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Schwester Argenta wirkt müde — sie hat dunkle Ringe unter den Augen, ihre Harre sind etwas zerzaust und sie bewegt sich, als wäre sie leicht angespannt und nervös. Sie grüßt dich mit einem streng, etwas misstrauischen Blick.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}? Wollt Ihr etwas von mir? Ich hatte gehofft, in Ruhe beten zu können ..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sœur Argenta semble exténuée : des cernes noirs soulignent ses yeux, ses cheveux sont emmêlés et ses mouvements trahissent la tension qui l'habite.{/n} « {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}{/g} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta looks tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat dishevelled, and she moves like she's a little on edge.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sœur Argenta semble exténuée : de sombres cercles soulignent ses yeux, ses cheveux sont emmêlés, et elle se déplace de manière tendue. Elle vous salue avec un regard austère et quelque peu méfiant.{/n} « {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}{/g} ? Vous vouliez me parler ? J'espérais pouvoir prier seule pendant un temps... »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Rahibe Argenta yorgun görünüyor. Gözlerinin altı kararmış, saçları darmadağın ve gerginliği hareketlerine yansıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta looks tired — there are dark circles under her eyes, her hair is somewhat dishevelled, and she moves like she's a little on edge.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Rahibe Argenta yorgun görünüyor. Gözlerinin altı kararmış, saçları darmadağın ve gerginliği hareketlerine yansıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
